body.p: Recognition links the elements, the statement of financial position and the statement(s) of financial performance as follows (see DiagramÂ 5.1):

li.p: in the statement of financial position at the beginning and end of the reporting period, total assets minus total liabilities equal total equity; and
recognised changes in equity during the reporting period comprise:
income minus expenses recognised in the statement(s) of financial performance; plus
contributions from holders of equity claims, minus distributions to holders of equity claims.
